name: 123 Reg
description: 123 Reg was launched in 2000, and has since grown into the UK's largest domain registrar, having registered over 3 million domain names. Our philosophy is simple: the internet is for the many, not the few, which is why every single product is designed for the small business owner looking for an easy, hassle-free way of getting online. Whether you're tech savvy or a complete novice, we have the tools and platforms to help you build your dream site.
